node.display_long_description:
“《SUPERHOT VR》让人无法自拔”- Polygon

屡获殊荣且大受欢迎的《SUPERHOT VR》将谨慎的战略和放纵的厮杀合而为一，给你带来最完整的VR动作游戏体验。只有你移动，时间才会流动。

没有再生的生命条，也没有预先放置的弹药掉落。你孤身一人，势单力薄，弹尽粮绝。唯有抓起敌人掉落的武器进行厮杀和射击，操纵时间躲过枪林弹雨。 
 
你从未玩过这样的游戏，这游戏有些不同之处。真实被抛诸脑后。 

深受无数玩家喜爱，经过进一步打磨的不朽之作，Quest推出最完整的《SUPERHOT VR》体验。 

呕心沥血重新打造出原汁原味的风貌。不受任何干扰，全神贯注于《SUPERHOT》招牌慢动作战斗的猛烈攻势。关卡中的金字塔都消失了。如同跳着死亡之舞的舞者，在动作间不受阻碍地流动。 

不受拘束，也不妥协。 

大脑是软件
现在你自由了。

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.13
> Fixed few leaderboard and scoring system issues

// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.126
> Hotfix for vanishing floppy disks in save slot 2 and 3 under certain conditions

// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.125

A gift from us, to you, with love! This free, surprise “Boxing Day” update introduces an all-new holiday-themed game mode, a brand new endless level, a new scoring system, and a suitably festive soundtrack!

The Boxing Day update also features an exclusive leaderboard to show off your holiday survival skills. Get points for punching, dodging, headshots, style shots, and much more - and see how you stack up against your friends and enemies! 

After completing SUPERHOT VR, players can access the new Boxing Day content by loading the Endless floppy disk in the Hacker Room and selecting the Christmas Tree.  

We’re also adding support for Oculus Challenges on Quest. Via the Oculus Scoreboard app, you can now create mini-tournaments for friends and fellow players based around the Boxing Day update and the existing Endless levels. 

The SUPERHOT Team sincerely wishes everyone a most excellent and triumphant 2021 <3

// Bugs & Improvements & Updates

> Added new Boxing Day content 
> Added new leaderboard functionality
> Support for Oculus Challenges on Quest
> Support for Oculus Destinations on Quest
> New in-game menu replacing the existing piOS BIOS menu at startup, allowing you to now change settings during gameplay
> Menu settings now have previews & clearer descriptions
> Removed “exit guest” mode pyramids - you can now exit from the in-game menu instead
> Fixed bullets occasionally passing through weapons
> Fixed broken floppy disk grab sound in 4th Hacker Room
> Fixed broken Hacker Room videos
> Various other minor bug fixes 
> Additional performance improvements

nodes.title: 5 years, 10k reviews and 1 million copies sold!
nodes.body_text:
Hi Friends!

It’s been a wild ride ever since we released the original, non VR, very flat SUPERHOT on February 25th, 2016. 5 years ago. Half a decade.1825 ish days. That’s a hell of a lot of time. Can you believe it? We hardly can. It spawned a franchise that’s still going strong to this day.

SUPERHOT VR was our next title and it turned out to be more fun, more successful, and more amazing than we ever hoped.

On Quest, we recently hit a couple of incredible SUPERHOT VR milestones. 1 million copies sold and over 10k reviews. We could not be happier and more thankful for the love you have shown us.

To help celebrate we’re going to be discounting SUPERHOT VR on Quest in the coming days. Tell your friends. Spread the system.

For the curious, check our out website superhotgame.com if you want to delve into the SUPERHOT story so far.

Sincerest thanks once again to all our fans, our players and everyone involved in everything SUPERHOT. You are the best.

Always and forever, 
SUPERHOT Team

node.reviewDescription:
The game is hard to put into words, so I’ll try my best. 



Most people who don’t buy the game would probably just think that’s your average FPS game but your enemies are red this time (Spoiler alert) it’s not.

So the concept is simple enough. You’re just another somebody who puts a game chip into a computer then puts on a VR headset to play a game where time moves when you do.

Now every 3 or so Levels, you get blasted back into the “real world” to put a new chip in the computer.



Now here’s where it gets tricky to explain: in VR, random words like “getting closer” or “use your ability” pop up and then your in-game world and VR world merge together until their pretty much one with each other (I am aware I left out the part about the final boss-I didn’t want to spoil it for new players).




After the original campaign, you are transferred back to the real world with about 5 (or plus the guest chip 6) new chips. The main ones being “endless”, “speed run”, and replay the campaign.

If you’re experienced with VR FPS games, I think you will catch on quickly and I very much recommend it to you. Newer players to the game style will take a little more time to get it, but once you have, then the sky’s the limit.
node.reviewTitle: Impossible to explain the game in words

website_page_meta.description:
《SUPERHOT VR》 这款主视角射击游戏，打通了小心谋划策略与大胆搏杀进击之间的界限。在游戏中，人前进时，时间才前进。



“《SUPERHOT VR》让你感到热血沸腾” 
- Polygon

“就像一场美妙的死亡芭蕾” 
- Gamespot


赢得了数十项年度虚拟现实游戏大奖，成为了PC和主机的VR游戏典型，《SUPERHOT VR》现已为Oculus Quest精心重制。这是史上最好的《SUPERHOT》了。

没有缆绳，没有限制，没有妥协。
让系统释放你的自由。
website_page_meta.title: SUPERHOT VR · Oculus Quest
